text: Winterset is a 1936 American crime drama movie directed by Alfred Santell and was based on the 1935 play of the same name by Maxwell Anderson. It stars Burgess Meredith (in his film debut), Margo, Eduardo Ciannelli, Maurice Moscovitch, Stanley Ridges, Willard Robertson, Alec Craig and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1937. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 crime drama movies Category:1930s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Alfred Santell
title: Winterset (movie)
